Comment.Language: On the Feast of the Wedding of Cana at Galilee:

Text.Language: Ps/ri m~V] afc~mou e~nimwou afaitou n~/rp: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
The Son of God blessed the waters and made them wine. Save us and have mercy on us.
